we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured,'' Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post. Eric Schmidt said that he would focus on external issues, such as deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, whilLarry Page would`` merge Google's technology and business vision.'' after a Robert Horry-clock violation on Philadelphia with 4.9 seconds left. Šarūnas Jasikevičius threw an inbound pass to Stephen Jackson , who went around a stumbling Kyle Korver to make an uncontested Robert Horry .`` I was 0-for-infinity,'' Stephen Jackson said. I just wanted to make a Robert Horry . We knew they'd switch. I went backdoor and got to the basket. My teammates showed confidence in me to give me the ball. It seemed like I hadn't made a Robert Horry all game. Stephen Jackson missed 15 of his first 19 Robert Horrys before the easy layup. Chris Webber then missed a jumper at the buzzer after an inbound pass from Allen Iverson .`` For that to happen with 4.9 seconds left, it's

Mr Micheál Martin said he was amazed at Mr Enda Kenny 's reluctance to go head-to-head on a series of television debates, possibly RTE, TV3, Sky and one match up in Irish on TG4. Remember it was Enda Kenny who said some time ago actually that he was not worried about how many debates and who would participate, the former foreign affairs minister said.`` I think he should not avoid it. He should come up front and face myself and Eamon Gilmore on debates.'' Copyright( c)

Facebook group pleading for Sue to join the' X Factor' panel- and Jane Lynch agrees her character would make a`` fantastic'' judge, though she would probably clash with Simon Cowell . She said: People have asked me,` What about having Sue on` The X Factor'? How would she do?' I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears.`` It can never happen, though. Simon Cowell and Sue on the same judging panel will never work in a million years- there's only room for one ego on the show! was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for Eric Holcomb .`` I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it,'' Jackie Walorski said. I think he'd clear the field. Paul Staines pursued the political power nexus between News Corp and the David Cameron clan with the same vigour he employs to uncover politicians' secrets?`` The BBC is the pervasive influence on our society,'' he argues. It is monolithic and uses all of its old-school-tie contacts. I don't think Rebekah Brooks comes from that background. At least with Murdoch you know where you stand. The Guardian targeted Andy Coulson over the phone-hacking affair`` as a proxy because you all hate News International,'' he claims.
